components.hint: Contact - with the child’s family/others, how was the child, how was the family/others, when they did not turn up and any reason given; Dates when the child is away from the foster home – with family, friends, school trips, introductions to new carers; Details of times when the child is with other carers such as babysitters and who they were;
components.label: Tell us about any contacts the child has had with other people
components.name: auto_name__8
